sense.gloss: having at one's mercy, trifling with, toying with, playing with, making a fool of, leading around by the nose, tossing about (a ship), buffeting
to tinker with, to fumble with, to twist up
making a plaything of (someone), treating as a plaything, trifling with
to play with, to joke, to use (esp. trick, sophistry, etc.)
to deride, to scoff at, to make fun of
meddling, fumbling, fondling, playing around with something
to finger, to touch, to play with, to fiddle with, to toy with
to make changes to, to tinker with, to tamper with
to dabble in, to do as a hobby, to play around with
to tease, to make fun of
to grope, to feel around (in one's pocket, bag, etc.)
to play with (a toy, one's hair, etc.), to fiddle with
to toy with (one's emotions, etc.), to trifle with
to do with something as one pleases

sdata.j: ヨットは↑猛威↑↓もうい↓を↑振↑↓ふ↓るう↑嵐↑↓あらし↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑翻弄↑↓ほんろう↓された。
sdata.e: The yacht was at the mercy of the dreadful storm.

sdata.j: ↑船↑↓ふね↓は↑波↑↓なみ↓に↑翻弄↑↓ほんろう↓されていた。
sdata.e: The ship was at the mercy of the waves.

sdata.j: あなたは↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑気持↑↓きも↓ちを↑弄↑↓もてあそ↓んではいけない。
sdata.e: You should not trifle with his feelings.

sdata.j: ↑船↑↓ふね↓は↑風↑↓かぜ↓と↑波↑↓なみ↓に↑翻弄↑↓ほんろう↓されていた。
sdata.e: The ship was at the mercy of the wind and the waves.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑好天↑↓こうてん↓を↑利用↑↓りよう↓して↑庭↑↓にわ↓↑弄↑↓いじく↓りをした。
sdata.e: He took advantage of the good weather to do some gardening.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑事↑↓こと↓は↑本気↑↓ほんき↓ではない。↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓を↑弄↑↓もてあそ↓んでいるだけだ。
sdata.e: He's not serious about her at all - he's just playing with her.

sdata.j: ↑船↑↓ふね↓は↑嵐↑↓あらし↓に↑翻弄↑↓ほんろう↓されていた。
sdata.e: The ship was at the mercy of the storm.

sdata.j: ↑貧↑↓まず↓しい↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑愚弄↑↓ぐろう↓してはいけない。
sdata.e: You should not fool with poor people.

sdata.j: ↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓を↑弄↑↓いじく↓り↑回↑↓まわ↓すのはやめなさい。
sdata.e: Please stop playing with your hat.

sdata.j: ポールはいつも↑女性↑↓じょせい↓の↑体↑↓からだ↓を↑弄↑↓いじく↓っている。

words.gloss: having at one's mercy, trifling with, toying with, playing with, making a fool of, leading around by the nose, tossing about (a ship), buffeting
to tinker with, to fumble with, to twist up
